ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for him who overstepped the bounds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then he who had been rebellious
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then as for him who is inordinate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then as for him who was insolent
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then, as for him who rebelled
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then as for him who waxed exorbitant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: as for him who has been rebellious
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then, for such as had transgressed all bounds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, for him who Tagha (transgressed all bounds, in disbelief, oppression and evil deeds of disobedience to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then as for whosoever was insolent
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As for him who was defiant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So as for he who transgressed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:37] as for him who was rebellious, [who] disbelieved,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then, as for him who rebelled) him who was too arrogant and proud and disbelieved in Allah, i.e. al-Nadr Ibn al-Harith Ibn 'Alqamah
